title: RIP galio
body:
http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Galio_0.jpg 

1. you destroyed his look, no longer a gargoyle (at least you didn't remake him into a Thomas tank engine thx)
2. you destroyed his kit, took away usefull skills and gave some weird complicated useless new ones completely altering his playstyle

god, don't just ruin all the good we have left yet, just make new champs if you absuletely must!


{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: I somewhat agree with this.  The removal of his old w basically murders the reason i used to play Galio.  Now, I grant you that I simply chose him as a Brand counter...  But this Galio doesnt seem very closely related to the old one.
Beyond the W change what do you not like about the new one? I personally thought this was an amazing VGU and would like to hear your ideas as someone who liked old galio on why it is bad.
the speed up on his e...and the slow and nuke on his q lol

What they did was actually make him follow what his bio made him out to be.


He was supposed to be a guardian that defended Demacia's villages and towns from Noxus, and upon losing his creator he vowed to fight for Demacia.


That is in no way reflected in his playstyle. 


All he is is a mage that casts some spells and occasionally flashes in to ult and taunt people. With his new playstyle you actually DEFEND people. You're actually doing what he was intended to do. I don't see how that's destroying the character, they actually made him what he was intended to be in his bio.
ill miss that old w heal .... the trollyness I used to do with it
You're right, because galio had a huge fanbase outside urf/aram.

Good. He needed it.

Get fucked.

"useless"

not a single ability of his is useless. galio is broken

Oh poor you. In your 4 seasons of playing LoL you've never played Galio a single time in ranked.

I'm so sick of all these "mains" that pop up everytime a champ gets reworked that act like it's the end of the world that the champ they've never actually played is "destroyed"

> don't ruin all the good we have left

Lmao
